auth.gdprTextStart: I have read and accept the Personal Data Processing Notice and the Privacy Policy.
auth.gdprClauseContent:
Data Controller: Kacper Sobierski, operating the Tackly application, contact: kacperrito21@wp.pl.

Purpose of processing:
- creating and maintaining the user account and providing the app’s features;
- communication regarding the account and the operation of the app.

Legal basis: Article 6(1)(b) GDPR – processing necessary for the performance of a contract (the app’s terms of use).
Data processed: first name, e-mail address, password (stored as a cryptographic hash).
Retention period: for as long as the account exists. After deletion – for the period necessary to establish or defend legal claims (max. 5 years) or as required by law.

Data recipients: hosting/IT infrastructure providers – Cloudflare, Inc. (USA), Vercel Inc. (USA) and Railway Systems, Inc. (USA) – only under data processing agreements.
Transfers outside the EEA: data may be transferred to the United States. Such transfers rely on the European Commission’s Standard Contractual Clauses and additional safeguards (e.g., encryption).

Your rights: access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, objection, and the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
Voluntary provision: providing data is voluntary but necessary to create an account and use the app.
Automated decisions/profiling: none.
